mean_cn: adj. 贫困的，处于不利地位的，社会地位低下的
mean_en: lacking the things (such as money and education) that are considered necessary for an equal position in society
word_etyma: dis否定 + advantaged有利的 → disadvantaged 不利的
sentence: We should help disadvantaged families so they can have better lives.
sentence_trans: 我们应该帮助贫困家庭，这样他们才能过上更好的生活。
